price: Ağızlarıyla Allah’ın nurunu söndürmek istiyorlar. Kâfirlerin hoşuna gitmese de Allah nurunu tamamlayacaktır.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَٱللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna liyuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wal-lahu mutimmu nūrihi walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
